name: Forbidden Healing
text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Adaptation
text: Adapt a friendly minion.
flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

name: Aldor Attendant
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost_of your Librams by_(1) this game.
flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Autodefense Matrix
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: We call it the bubble machine.

name: Avenge
text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

name: Blessed Goods
text: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3_Attack.
flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Bloodclaw
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Brazen Zealot
text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

name: Competitive Spirit
text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

name: Crystology
text: [x]Draw two 1-Attack\nminions from your deck.
flavor: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell\nCast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Divine Strength
text: Give a minion +1/+2.
flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

name: Eye for an Eye
text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: First Day of School
text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Galloping Savior
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
flavor: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

name: Getaway Kodo
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
flavor: Get to da Kodo! Now!

name: Glow-Tron
text: Magnetic
flavor: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

name: Grimscale Chum
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random\nMurloc in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Listen, see?  We'll take 'em to the docks, see?  And throw 'em in the sea, see?

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Hidden Wisdom
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

name: Imprisoned Sungill
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens, summon two 1/1\nMurlocs.
flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Judgment of Justice
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Knight of Anointment
text: Battlecry: Draw a\nHoly spell.
flavor: "I dub thee... injured."

name: Light's Justice
flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Lost in the Jungle
text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

name: Making Mummies
text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn\nminions.\nReward: Emperor Wraps.
flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

name: Meanstreet Marshal
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
flavor: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2_Health.
flavor: But sometimes concede.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: [x]Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavor: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
text: [x]After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

name: Reckoning
text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
flavor: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Paladin.

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Righteous Cause
text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.\nReward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

name: Rise to the Occasion
text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards.\nReward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

name: Sacred Trial
text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
flavor: You have chosen poorly.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Sand Breath
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.
flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Selfless Hero
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

name: Shield of Honor
text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: Vilefin Inquisitor
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
flavor: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

name: Wave of Apathy
text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: A Light in the Darkness
text: Discover a minion.\nGive it +1/+1.
flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: Air Raid
text: Twinspell\nSummon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

name: Argent Braggart
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack and Health to match the highest in the battlefield.
flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Argent Lance
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Cathedral Gargoyle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

name: City Tax
text: [x]Tradeable\nLifesteal. Deal $1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

name: Conviction (Rank 1)
text: [x]Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

name: Crystalsmith Kangor
text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal\nYour healing is doubled.
flavor: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

name: Dark Conviction
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

name: Desperate Stand
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

name: Drygulch Jailor
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

name: Flash of Light
text: Restore #4 Health.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Hand of A'dal
text: Give a minion +2/+1.\nDraw a card.
flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Holy Light
text: Restore #6 Health.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Hydrologist
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

name: Immortal Prelate
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
flavor:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

name: Libram of Wisdom
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Twinspell\nGive a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Micro Mummy
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

name: Murgur Murgurgle
text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Mysterious Blade
text: Battlecry: If you control a\nSecret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Noble Mount
text: G[x]ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

name: Potion of Heroism
text: Give a minion Divine_Shield.\nDraw a card.
flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

name: Primalfin Champion
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

name: Pursuit of Justice
text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor: "Is this about justice or just us?"
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Paladin.

name: Rebuke
text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Sanctuary
text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

name: Sandwasp Queen
text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
flavor: Oooh, see that wasp! \nWatch that sting! \nDig in the Sandwasp Queen!

name: Seal of Light
text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

name: Shielded Minibot
text: Divine Shield
flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

name: Shotbot
text: Reborn
flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

name: Sir Finley of the Sands
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, Discover an\nupgraded Hero Power.
flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

name: Snack Run
text: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

name: Soldier's Caravan
text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon two 1/1\nSilver Hand Recruits.
flavor: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

name: Sound the Bells!
text: Echo\nGive a minion +1/+2.
flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

name: Subdue
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

name: Sword of the Fallen
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\ncast a Secret from\nyour deck.
flavor: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry: Change an_enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Alliance Bannerman
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion.\nGive minions in your\nhand +1/+1.
flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

name: Benevolent Djinn
text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

name: Bronze Explorer
text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Bronze Herald
text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Call to Adventure
text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Carnival Barker
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavor: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Catacomb Guard
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."

name: Ceremonial Maul
text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

name: Coghammer
text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

name: Commander Rhyssa
text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Day at the Faire
text: Summon 3 Silver\nHand Recruits.\nCorrupt: Summon 5.
flavor: Karl knew he would someday regret that turkey leg.

name: Divine Favor
text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

name: Dragonrider Talritha
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Paladin.

name: Gift of Luminance
text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a_1/1 copy of it.
flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Goody Two-Shields
text: Divine Shield\nSpellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: High Priest Thekal
text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1_of your Hero's Health into Armor.
flavor: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

name: Howling Commander
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

name: Imprisoned Celestial
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns.\nSpellburst: Give your minions\nDivine Shield.
flavor: "Look at your deck, now back to me, now back at your deck, now back to me. Who am I? None of your—I'm on a horse."

name: Lightbringer's Hammer
text: Lifesteal\nCan't attack heroes.
flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

name: Lord Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Nightbane Templar
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
flavor: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Northwatch Commander
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavor: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Paragon of Light
text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

name: Rallying Blade
text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Salhet's Pride
text: Deathrattle: Draw two\n1-Health minions from your_deck.
flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

name: Scarlet Purifier
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

name: Seal of Champions
text: Give a minion\n+3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

name: Seedcloud Buckler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give your\n_minions Divine Shield.
flavor: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

name: Sky Claw
text: Your other Mechs\nhave +1 Attack.\nBattlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

name: Small-Time Recruits
text: [x]Draw three 1-Cost\nminions from your deck.
flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

name: Steward of Darkshire
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Time Out!
text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal
flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

name: Ancestral Guardian
text: Lifesteal\nReborn
flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Annoy-o-Module
text: Magnetic\nDivine Shield\nTaunt
flavor: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

name: Arrogant Crusader
text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

name: Balloon Merchant
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Bellringer Sentry
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

name: Blessing of Kings
text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Call to Arms
text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

name: Cariel Roame
text: [x]Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy ______spells in your hand by (1).___
flavor: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

name: Chillblade Champion
text: Charge\nLifesteal
flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

name: Consecration
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

name: First Blade of Wrynn
text: [x]Divine Shield\nBattlecry: Gain Rush if this\nhas at least 4 Attack.
flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

name: Hammer of Wrath
text: Deal $3 damage.\nDraw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Invigorating Sermon
text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Keeper of Uldaman
text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Light's Sorrow
text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

name: Lightforged Zealot
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a __4/2_Truesilver_Champion._
flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lightfused Stegodon
text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver_Hand Recruits.
flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

name: Murloc Knight
text: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Time is mana!

name: Prismatic Lens
text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Silvermoon Portal
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Spirit of the Tiger
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
flavor: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

name: The Glass Knight
text: [x]Divine Shield\nWhenever you restore Health,\ngain Divine Shield.
flavor: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Veteran Warmedic
text: [x]After you cast a Holy spell,\nsummon a 2/2 Medic\nwith Lifesteal.
flavor: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Zandalari Templar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've restored\n10 Health this game, gain\n+4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

name: Aldor Truthseeker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavor: It’s under 'T.'

name: Amber Watcher
text: Battlecry: Restore #8_Health.
flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Blessed Champion
text: Double a minion's Attack.
flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Blessing of Authority
text: Give a minion +8/+8. It_can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: Bolvar Fordragon
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood
text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: He's so hot right now.

name: Cannonmaster Smythe
text: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
flavor: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Divine Shield\nCorrupt: Gain +3/+3 and_Taunt.
flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Cobalt Guardian
text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

name: Dragon Consort
text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
flavor: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Duel!
text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.\nThey fight!
flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: Ghostly Charger
text: Divine Shield\nRush
flavor: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

name: Glowstone Technician
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "Windell! More light!"\n\n"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

name: Grimestreet Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

name: High Abbess Alura
text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: Holy Wrath
text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Libram of Justice
text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Mechano-Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
flavor: When you need more iron in your diet.

name: Prince Liam
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all\n1-Cost cards in your deck\n_into Legendary minions.
flavor: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

name: Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

name: Righteousness
text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Scalelord
text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Shrink Ray
text: Set the Attack and Health of all minions\nto 1.
flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Solemn Vigil
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.
howToGet: Unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Hidden Laboratory, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

name: Tuskarr Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #7 Health to your hero.
flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

name: Avenging Wrath
text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Blackguard
text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

name: Crystal Lion
text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

name: Devout Pupil
text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Enter the Coliseum
text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Highlord Fordragon
text: [x]Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion __in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

name: Ivory Knight
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell.\nRestore Health to your hero\nequal to its Cost.
flavor: Do NOT call it a "horse".
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Spikeridged Steed
text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Sunkeeper Tarim
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: A New Challenger...
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Commencement
text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Eadric the Pure
text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions'\nAttack to 1.
flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

name: Grimestreet Protector
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent\n_minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Kangor's Endless Army
text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavor: "That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."\n- Countess Ashmore

name: Lady Liadrin
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Libram of Judgment
text: Corrupt: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: You really can't judge a book by its cover.

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

name: Party Up!
text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

name: Vinecleaver
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon two 1/1 Silver\nHand Recruits.
flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

name: Dinosize
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

name: High Exarch Yrel
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw_3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
text: At the end of your turn, restore #8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Silver Sword
text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

name: Tip the Scales
text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3_Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks\na minion, set the defender's\nAttack and Health to 3.
flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Libram of Hope
text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

name: Anyfin Can Happen
text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
flavor: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal\n Costs (1) less for each Mana\nyou've spent on spells.
flavor: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.
